messages.message:
Linda
I would like a list for Costco by Sunday at noon.  If not, I will bring stuff when we come for the 1st football game on the 2nd of September.  Let me know what you need!

Facebook User
Here is my list so far, and this should last quite a while up here with only two people to feed instead of three:

Frozen Chicken
Chicken Tenders
Chili
Potstickers
Burgers
Shrimp
Popcorn
Granola Bars
Bath Soap
Hand Soap

Brian also wanted you to fund with the cookout with:
12-ish brats
12-ish hot dogs
2 dozen hamburger buns
1 dozen hot dog buns
Paper plates
PLastic cups

If you don't want to buy any of the party stuff then don't. we'll just take care of it.

Linda
I will let you know how much party stuff I get so you will know.  I may have some of it.

Facebook User
What time are you planning on coming up on Tuesday? I have all of my marching sticks in my drum bag that is still with all of my drum stuff. I have a crappy pair for a little while.

Linda
I am not going to get there until the afternoon.  Chase might be coming earlier.  Deb, Laura and I are stopping in Jerome for lunch and I don't know what else after that.

Facebook User
Hey i also need my Shower brush and shampoo.

Linda
Which shampoo?  There are a couple up there.  I found the brush and put it with your drums.

Facebook User
Doesn't matter really. What is chase bringing up? I like the suave upstairs the best. It is raining like hell here right now. Thunder is like right above our heads.
